issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Titanium.Database.ResultSet.fieldName([index]) is not returning the correct value

comments.body:
Verified using: 

Windows 10 Pro 
Visual Studio 2015 Community Update 2 
Appc Core: 5.3.0-46 
Appc NPM: 4.2.5-5 
Ti SDK: 5.3.0.v20160523083840
Lumia 520 8.1, Lumia 930 10.0

Titanium.Database.ResultSet.fieldName([index]) now returns the expected value of the fields name rather than the fields values

Closing ticket
